website_summaries.verdict: It's not for everyone, but if you are looking for an organic bodywash with a bold, masculine scent, there's a good chance this versatile product will work for you.
pros: Combines natural, organic ingredients in a formula that can be used on the body and face
Contains moisturizing plant-based oils including pine and jojoba and aloe vera
cons: Mixed opinions on the scent – some men love the robust aroma, while others didn't like it

customer_reviews.title: Funny smell and an amazon logo on the label
customer_reviews.text: Odd waxy plastic odor and there is an actual amazon.com logo on the label on the bottle that you get to look at every time you use it. Seems to work ok as soap if you don’t mind the smell. Poor branding as well. Very expensive. Low quality pump top. I’m probably going to return this.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but too perfume-like and spendy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for a great woodsy scent for years and unfortunately will be continuing that search. This product is more on the “perfume” side of the spectrum vs. a scent of the great woods. Also the size is quite small for the price. On a positive note it does “suds up” well and seems to do a good job of cleaning in general.
customer_reviews.author: Justin P McDonald

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT!! product.
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this product from the moment I twisted off the cap. The aroma is AMAZING. Men, I promise you, the woods scent does not disappoint. I will be using the body & face wash tomorrow morning. I already know I'll love it even more. I am a new customer who will continue to buy Gentlemen's Reserve products for years and years. Will write follow up review.👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: T.Lucalake

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and cleans well. I noticed it does not lather on a wash cloth but lathers well with a loofah or brush.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love how this stuff smells on my SO
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love how this stuff smells on my SO. He has naturally greasy skin and this body wash does him well. It seems to be a good balance because he doesnt break out after using it, but doesn't completely dry out his skin, either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great smell
customer_reviews.text: This is a great smelling product! It works great on my eczema prone skin with no irritation. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Logan Rice

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, only reason for the 3 stars is that I wish the cedarcand pine scent was stronger. Overall I’m happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: JasonD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome soap. I have extremely sensitive dry skin and have tried so many washes only to be disappointed. Gentleman’s Reserve is the only wash I’ve had success with.
customer_reviews.author: Kevis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, my skin gets clean
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, my skin gets clean, and taking care of very efficiently, no drynnes after showering, I'm very pleased with this product, I will get and try out more of this comoany.
customer_reviews.author: mauro ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fragrance!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ever! Cleans amazingly and rinses completely. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: John Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Looses fragrance fast.
customer_reviews.text: This soap lost it's fragrance 3 days after opening. I will not order again
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Holley

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite body wash! Smells great and doesn’t dry out your skin. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jon K.

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and a full body wash that's natural.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product line. I've tried the lotion, balm and 2 in 1 Body wash in both scents. Definitely keeping this in my shower for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Loudbyte

customer_reviews.title: Too watery
customer_reviews.text: Requires too much product to cover body. Lacks suds as well.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive but you use very little each time. Delighted
customer_reviews.author: Norman H.

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Very clean rinsing, feel very clean after using. Fragrance is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: smells good
customer_reviews.text: Came with the cap busted open and spilled all in the package smh.....smells good tho
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: All natural / organic ingredients, has an awesome woody-citrus scent. Only complaint is the bottle is too small. I would pay for the larger size, doesn't have to be huge, but a 20 or 22oz bottle would be nice. Also to address the couple of complaints about it not "foaming"... it's made entirely of natural ingredients, there are no chemical foaming agents. Companies use foaming agents so stupid people perceive their garbage is working. Foaming agents are not beneficial in any way and are not ideal for your skin or hair.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, he was honestly very hard critic and extremely hard to shop for this section. I am here to say I am forever I am a proud 100% honest returning customer. So happy with what my husband had to say about their product!!!!! He loved the scent, I loved the way his skin felt, I loved the way he smelled. It was excellent on both ends. And I love shopping for my husband. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: A P

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: As much as I like the bar soap version of this, I am extremely disappointed in the body wash. Doesn't suds up or make me feel clean when I wash off. The smell is nice and isn't too strong but if my skin feels dry and sticky when I'm done then this product is not for me
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Smells/works great. Makes skin feel dry when wet.
customer_reviews.text: Great body wash. Smells great and cleans great. But it gives that feeling of being dry when you're rinsing it off. Which is a pet peeve of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great but expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite body wash. Love the scent. I would give it 5 stars if the price was more reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: JediMutt

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Found
customer_reviews.text: I love the delivery efficiency, great overall body clean feeling and wife loves smell!!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the scent, although it doesn't last very long. The soap rinses clean and leaves you feeling fresh. It's a little bit expensive however I like having a product that doesn't have a whole bunch of artificial chemicals in it.
customer_reviews.author: PortDawg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and how it lathers up. The wife loves the smell, also.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It smells great, it's organic and I can use it as a face and body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B

customer_reviews.title: Als experiences
customer_reviews.text: It had a great smell but when it arrived the pump cap was open just enough to make a big mess in the box
customer_reviews.author: Algenon Vaughn Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The entire house smells so good after he
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this body wash. The entire house smells so good after he showers
customer_reviews.author: Rescue A Pet

customer_reviews.title: It keeps my skin clear better than any prescription soap that I have tried in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of many times that I have ordered this product. It keeps my skin clear better than any prescription soap that I have tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great body wash and smells great, just not sure the price is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise Campos

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Smell as said in other reviews was so so. Not strong and not great. Also had bet small lather, listen to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Poor hydration
customer_reviews.text: Like the scent but the product doesn’t lather well. Bought this because of dry winter skin but it leaves a dry feeling similar to cheap bar soap. Been using it for a couple days now an see no improvement on skin hydration.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Thann body wash is what I prefer
customer_reviews.text: Smells strong like a pesticide to me .I don't like it . Also it came with the top pump broken. I prefer the thann body wash much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its fine but kinda $$$
customer_reviews.text: It left a waxy feeling like the bar soap in hotels if that make sense. Smelled nice but doesn’t linger
customer_reviews.author: k bear

product_meta.title: Gentlemen's Reserve All Over Wash (Cedarwood & Pine Scent) Body Wash + Face Wash + Shampoo 16 oz…
feature_bullets: All-Natural Body and Face Wash for Men: An organic 2-in-1 body and face cleanser that restores moisture, while gently cleansing and hydrating your skin.
Manly Woods Scent: Gentlemen’s Reserve invigorating cedarwood and pine-scented wash was expertly crafted to ensure you leave the house smelling your manly best.

Chemical-Free & Cruelty-Free: Our active body and face wash is a chemical- and cruelty-free shower gel that works on normal, dry and sensitive skin. It contains no parabens, sulfates, alcohol, or silicones.

Luxury Men’s Grooming: We only use organic ingredients with great health benefits - Cedarwood oil for clear skin, relaxation, and anti-stress; Lemon verbena oil to reduce puffiness; and Rosemary extract to disinfect your skin.

More Amazing Benefits: This Woods Scent bottle weighs 16 fluid ounces (473 milliliters) and is packed with endless goodness. Other ingredients include olive oil, jojoba oil, and aloe vera to moisturize, condition, and protect your skin from aging.
